export.name: Export timestamps
export.description: Exports the timestamps of the person entering and leaving the zone.

person.name: Person
person.description: The person entity to export the timestamps for.

zone.name: Zone
zone.description: The zone entity to export the timestamps for.

date_start.name: Start date
date_start.description: The start date of the period to export the timestamps for.

date_end.name: End date
date_end.description: The end date of the period to export the timestamps for.
